patch:
@@ -569,7 +569,7 @@
     <!-- Match this with what Spark version wants -->
     <scala.minor.version>2.11</scala.minor.version>
     <scala.complete.version>${scala.minor.version}.8</scala.complete.version>
-    <hadoop.version>2.7.5</hadoop.version>
+    <hadoop.version>3.2.2</hadoop.version>
     <jackson.version>2.8.7</jackson.version>
     <javadoc.plugin.version>3.0.0-M1</javadoc.plugin.version>
     <jersey.version>2.26</jersey.version>
@@ -638,8 +638,8 @@
               <id>enforce</id>
               <configuration>
                 <rules>
-                  <requireModuleConvergence />
-                  <requirePluginVersions />
+                  <requireModuleConvergence/>
+                  <requirePluginVersions/>
                   <requireMavenVersion>
                     <version>3.2.5</version>
                   </requireMavenVersion>
@@ -887,9 +887,9 @@
                   </relocation>
                 </relocations>
                 <transformers>
-                  <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ApacheNoticeResourceTransformer" />
-                  <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ApacheLicenseResourceTransformer" />
-                  <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ServicesResourceTransformer" />
+                  <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ApacheNoticeResourceTransformer"/>
+                  <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ApacheLicenseResourceTransformer"/>
+                  <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ServicesResourceTransformer"/>
                   <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.AppendingTransformer">
                     <resource>reference.conf</resource>
                   </transformer>
@@ -1150,7 +1150,7 @@
       <id>cdh513</id>

         <cdh.version>5.13.1</cdh.version>
-        <hadoop.version>2.6.0-cdh${cdh.version}</hadoop.version>
+        <hadoop.version>3.2.2</hadoop.version>
         <spark.version>2.2.0.cloudera1</spark.version>
         <zookeeper.version>3.4.5-cdh${cdh.version}</zookeeper.version>
         <kafka.version>0.11.0-kafka-3.0.0</kafka.version>

             </executions>
             <configuration>
-              <keyname>Sean Owen (Cloudera) <sowen@cloudera.com></keyname>
